resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108508</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108508</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202788</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Archaeological Soils</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Archäologischer Boden</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sols Archéologiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Solos Archaeological</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Terreni Archaeological</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αρχαιολογικά χώματα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Suelos Arqueológicos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will determine components of a soil sample and evaluate how archaeologists use soils to interpret sites.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer stellen Bestandteile einer 
Bodenprobe fest und werten aus, wie Archäologen Boden benutzen, um 
Sites zu deuten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants détermineront des composants d'un 
échantillon de sol et évalueront comment les archéologues emploient
des sols pour interpréter des sites.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes determinarão componentes de uma 
amostra do solo e avaliarão como os arqueólogos usam solos 
interpretar locais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi determineranno i componenti di un 
campione del terreno e valuteranno come gli archeologhi usano i 
terreni per interpretare i luoghi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα καθορίσουν τα συστατικά ενός 
εδαφολογικού δείγματος και θα αξιολογήσουν πώς οι αρχαιολόγοι 
χρησιμοποιούν τα χώματα για να ερμηνεύσουν τις περιοχές.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes determinarán componentes de una 
muestra del suelo y evaluarán cómo los arqueólogos utilizan suelos 
para interpretar sitios.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:UNC ARCHAEOLOGY
FN:UNC ARCHAEOLOGY
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202788</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108508</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/archaeological-soils</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
